original: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di lta ste /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: gzugs ni / sprul pa lta bu /🔽tshor ba ni /
analyzed: gzugs ni / sprul pa lta bu / tshor ba ni /
translated: Form is like an emanation.

original: sprul pa lta bu /🔽'du shes ni /
analyzed: sprul pa lta bu / 'du shes ni /
translated: Feeling is like an emanation.

original: @322b sprul pa lta bu /🔽'du byed ni /
analyzed: @322b sprul pa lta bu / 'du byed ni /
translated: Perception is like an emanation.

original: sprul pa lta bu /🔽rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: sprul pa lta bu / rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: Formations are like an emanation.

original: sprul pa lta bu ste /🔽rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: sprul pa lta bu ste / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: Consciousness is like an emanation.

original: dbang po drug go /
analyzed: dbang po drug go /
translated: That which is consciousness is the six sense faculties.

original: de ni / phung po lnga'o //🔽de dag ni /
analyzed: de ni / phung po lnga'o // de dag ni /
translated: That is the five aggregates.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: Those are not apprehended because of inner emptiness.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: They are not apprehended because of outer emptiness.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: They are not apprehended because of inner and outer emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: They are not apprehended because of the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: They are not apprehended because of great emptiness.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //🔽'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so // 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: They are not apprehended because of ultimate emptiness.🔽They are not apprehended because of conditioned emptiness.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: They are not apprehended because of unconditioned emptiness.

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //🔽thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of the unlimited,🔽because of the emptiness of that which has neither beginning nor end,

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-dispersal,

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of inherent existence,

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of all things,

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so // mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics,🔽because of the emptiness of non-apprehension,

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of non-entities,

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: because of the emptiness of essential nature,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so //
translated: and because of the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Blessed One,

original: de lta lags na /
analyzed: de lta lags na /
translated: if that is so,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na /
translated: when the bodhisattva great beings who are beginners in the vehicle hear this teaching,

original: 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags gang /
analyzed: 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags gang /
translated: will not be afraid, terrified, and scared?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @323a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal @323a *//
translated: The Lord said,

original: pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: pa; rab 'byor /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'ang yin la /
analyzed: gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'ang yin la /
translated: if a bodhisattva great being is a beginner in the vehicle

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste /
translated: and is unskilled in means in the perfection of wisdom,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang ma 'ongs na /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang ma 'ongs na /
translated: and has not come into the hands of a spiritual friend,

original: 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'jigs shing dngang ba dang / skrag par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: he will be afraid, terrified, and scared.”

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das /
translated: He said, “Lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings hear this teaching,

original: mi 'jigs / mi dngang /
analyzed: mi 'jigs / mi dngang /
translated: they are not afraid, terrified, and scared.

original: mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags /
analyzed: mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags /
translated: What is that perfection of wisdom skilled in means?”🔽The Lord said,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: “Subhūti,

original: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
translated: Subhūti, here when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, with a thought endowed with the knowledge of all aspects they investigate form as impermanent.

original: de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend that.

original: tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
analyzed: tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /

original: de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend that.

original: 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
analyzed: 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
translated: They investigate perception as impermanent.

original: de mi dmigs so; ;'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
analyzed: de mi dmigs so; ;'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
translated: They do not apprehend that. They investigate volitional factors as impermanent.

original: de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend that.

original: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste /

original: de mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de mi dmigs so //
translated: They do not apprehend that.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti, this

translated: He attends to the suffering of conditioned things, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to the selflessness of conditioned things, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to the peacefulness of conditioned things, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: They do not have the attention of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: They pay attention to conditioned things in the aspect of emptiness, paying attention to them in a way that does not apprehend anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: They do not have the attention of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: They pay attention to conditioned things in the aspect of signlessness, paying attention to them in a way that does not apprehend anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: They do not have the attention of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

analyzed: 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: They pay attention to conditioned things in the aspect of wishlessness, paying attention to them in a way that does not apprehend anything.

analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan @333a *//
translated: They do not have the attention of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: pas; 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: pas; 'du byed gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: They pay attention to conditioned things in the aspect of nonperformance, paying attention to them in a way that does not apprehend anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to the formations as void, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to consciousness as impermanent, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to consciousness as suffering, but he does so without apprehending anything.

analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to consciousness as nonself, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to the cognition that is the aspect of peace, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to the cognition that is the aspect of emptiness, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam @333b par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to the cognition that is the aspect of signlessness, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: He does not have the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: He attends to the cognition that is the aspect of wishlessness, but he does so without apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: not having the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: he attends to the consciousness that is not a composite in such a way that he does not apprehend it.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas /
translated: not having the attentions of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do //
translated: he attends to the consciousness that is isolated in such a way that he does not apprehend it.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste /
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ faultless perfection of morality.

original: de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it exists, those bodhisattva great beings do not tremble, feel frightened, or become terrified.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /
translated: in terms of suffering, in terms of no self,

original: zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang /🔽bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @334a *//
analyzed: zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtog par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang / mos pa 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @334a *//
translated: in terms of peace, in terms of emptiness, in terms of signlessness, in terms of wishlessness, in terms of no composition, in terms of no production, in terms of no cessation, in terms of no defilement, in terms of no purification, in terms of no apprehended object, in terms of no apprehending subject, in terms of no dharma, in terms of no nondharma,🔽this is called the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of patience.

original: po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of patience.

original: de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Because it exists, bodhisattva great beings are not afraid, are not terrified, and do not feel terror.”

original: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rab 'byor / gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: Furthermore, Subhūti, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
translated: they thoroughly investigate “form is impermanent” in the manner of not apprehending anything.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: With attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
translated: they thoroughly investigate “form is suffering” in the manner of not apprehending anything.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: With attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
translated: they thoroughly investigate “form is selfless” in the manner of not apprehending anything.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: With attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,🔽they thoroughly investigate “form is impure” in the manner of not apprehending anything.

original: gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go ;rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: “Form is calm” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is empty” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is signless” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.

original: gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: “Form is wishless” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is without production” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.

original: gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: “Form is without cessation” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is pure” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is not produced” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.

original: gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /🔽rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @334b dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid @334b dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: “Form is not stopped” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is not defiled” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is not purified” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.🔽“Form is not diminished” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.

original: gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
analyzed: gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go /
translated: “Form is not increased” is discerned by way of not apprehending anything.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi gegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /🔽'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing /

translated: “When bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom, they do not open the way for other things that are not wholesome and that obstruct awakening, such as keeping in mind the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, while thinking, ‘Form is not existent and not nonexistent,’ and so on up to ‘the understanding of all aspects is not existent and not nonexistent,’ and they do not open the way for other things that are not wholesome and that obstruct awakening, such as keeping in mind the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, while thinking, ‘Form is not empty and not not empty,’ and so on up to ‘the understanding of all aspects is not empty and not not empty,’ and they do not open the way for other things that are not wholesome and that obstruct awakening, such as keeping in mind the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, while thinking, ‘Form is not with signs and not signless,’ and so on up to ‘the understanding of all aspects is not with signs and not signless,’ and they do not open the way for other things that are not wholesome and that obstruct awakening, such as keeping in mind the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, while thinking, ‘Form is not having an intrinsic nature and not not having an intrinsic nature,’ and so on up to ‘the understanding of all aspects is not having an intrinsic nature and not not having an intrinsic nature.’
