original: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: but that feeling itself is emptiness,

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: and emptiness itself is feeling.

original: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that perception is empty because of the emptiness of perception,

original: 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: but that perception itself is emptiness,🔽and emptiness itself is perception.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so; ;'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes so; ;'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the aggregate of compositional factors is not the emptiness of compositional factors.

original: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Compositional factors themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //
translated: Emptiness itself is compositional factors.

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the aggregate of consciousness is not the emptiness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the eye is not the emptiness of the eye.

original: mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid @344a *//
analyzed: mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid @344a *//
translated: The eye itself is emptiness.

original: do; ;stong pa nyid kyang mig go /
analyzed: do; ;stong pa nyid kyang mig go /
translated: Emptiness itself is the eye.

original: rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the ear is not the emptiness of the ear.

original: rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The ear itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the ear.

original: sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi / sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the nose is not the emptiness of the nose.🔽The nose itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the nose.

original: lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the tongue is empty because of the emptiness of the tongue.

original: lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The tongue itself is emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is the tongue.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'o; ;lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'o; ;lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the body is empty because of the emptiness of the body.

original: lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The body itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the body.

original: yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi / yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: It is not that the mind is empty because of the emptiness of the mind.🔽The mind itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the mind.

original: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that forms are empty because of the emptiness of forms.

original: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Forms themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so //
translated: Emptiness itself is forms.

original: sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that sounds are empty because of the emptiness of sounds.

original: sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Sounds themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is sounds.

original: dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi / dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: It is not that smells are empty because of the emptiness of smells.🔽Smells themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dri'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dri'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is smells.

original: ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi / ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: It is not that the emptiness of the corpse is empty of the corpse.🔽The corpse itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ro'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ro'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the corpse.

original: reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the emptiness of contact is empty of contact.

original: reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Contact itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg go /
translated: Emptiness itself is contact.

original: chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the emptiness of mental phenomena is empty of mental phenomena.

original: chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Mental phenomena themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos so //
translated: Emptiness itself is mental phenomena.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i @344b stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i @344b stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the emptiness of eye consciousness is empty of eye consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Eye consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is eye consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the emptiness of ear consciousness is empty of ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Ear consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is also consciousness.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the nose consciousness does not make the nose consciousness empty.

original: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The nose consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the nose consciousness.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the tongue consciousness does not make the tongue consciousness empty.

original: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The tongue consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o //🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'o // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi / lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the tongue consciousness.🔽The emptiness of the body consciousness does not make the body consciousness empty.🔽The body consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the body consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the eye consciousness is empty because of the emptiness of the eye consciousness.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The eye consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the eye consciousness.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi / mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: It is not that the eye constituent is empty because of the emptiness of the eye constituent.🔽The eye constituent itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o //🔽rna ba'i 'dus te reg @345a *//🔽pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o // rna ba'i 'dus te reg @345a *// pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Emptiness itself is the eye constituent.🔽It is not that the ear constituent is empty because of the emptiness of the ear constituent.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The ear constituent itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the ear constituent.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the nose constituent is empty because of the emptiness of the nose constituent.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: the nose sense-sphere itself is empty,🔽emptiness itself is the nose sense-sphere.🔽The emptiness of the tongue sense-sphere is not the tongue sense-sphere,

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o; ;lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: the tongue sense-sphere is not empty of the tongue sense-sphere,

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: the tongue sense-sphere itself is empty,

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: emptiness itself is the tongue sense-sphere.🔽The emptiness of the body sense-sphere is not the body sense-sphere,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: the body sense-sphere is not empty of the body sense-sphere,

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: the body sense-sphere itself is empty,🔽emptiness itself is the body sense-sphere.🔽The emptiness of the thinking-mind sense-sphere is not the thinking-mind sense-sphere,

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o; ;yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: the thinking-mind sense-sphere is not empty of the thinking-mind sense-sphere,

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //🔽stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'o //
translated: the thinking-mind sense-sphere itself is empty,🔽emptiness itself is the thinking-mind sense-sphere.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is empty because of the emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact is itself emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is itself the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te @345b reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te @345b reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is empty because of the emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact is itself emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is itself the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact is empty because of the emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact.

original: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do /
analyzed: sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do /
translated: The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is not the emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is not the emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.🔽The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is not the emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.

original: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is not the emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is not the emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.🔽The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is not the emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.

original: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is not the emptiness of the condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded.

original: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: The condition of feeling that arises from the condition of sensory contact that is visually compounded is itself emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the condition of feeling that

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact is empty because of the emptiness of the feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact.

original: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact is itself empty.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is itself the feeling that arises from the condition of mental contact.

original: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis sa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the earth element is empty because of the emptiness of the earth element.

original: sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa @346a *//
analyzed: sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa @346a *//
translated: The earth element is itself empty.

original: nyid do // stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so //
analyzed: nyid do // stong pa nyid kyang sa'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness is itself the earth element.

original: chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: chu'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis chu'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the water element is empty because of the emptiness of the water element.

original: chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chu'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The water element is itself empty.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness is itself the water element.

original: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the fire element is empty because of the emptiness of the fire element.

original: me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The fire element is itself empty.

original: stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang me'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness also is the fire element.🔽The fire element is not empty because of the emptiness of the wind element.🔽The fire element itself also is emptiness.🔽Emptiness also is the fire element.

original: rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rlung gi khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rlung gi khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The wind element is not empty because of the emptiness of the wind element.

original: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rlung gi khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The wind element itself also is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rlung gi khams so //
translated: Emptiness also is the wind element.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The space element is not empty because of the emptiness of the space element.

original: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The space element itself also is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness also is the space element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams steng pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams steng pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The consciousness element is not empty because of the emptiness of the consciousness element.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The consciousness element itself also is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so //
translated: Emptiness also is the consciousness element.

original: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi / ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Ignorance is not empty because of the emptiness of ignorance.🔽Ignorance itself also is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o //
translated: Emptiness also is ignorance.

original: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byed stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byed stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that compounded phenomena are empty because of the emptiness of compounded phenomena.

original: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //
analyzed: 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do //
translated: Compounded phenomena themselves are emptiness.

original: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that consciousness is empty because of the emptiness of consciousness.

original: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Consciousness itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang @346b rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang @346b rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is consciousness.

original: ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis ming dang gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that name and form are empty because of the emptiness of name and form.

original: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Name and form themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so //
translated: Emptiness itself is name and form.

original: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: skye mched drug gi stong pa nyid kyis skye mched drug stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the six sense sources are empty because of the emptiness of the six sense sources.

original: skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye mched drug nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The six sense sources themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang skye mched drug go /
translated: Emptiness itself is the six sense sources.

original: reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that contact is empty because of the emptiness of contact.

original: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Contact itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang reg pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is contact.

original: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Feeling is not empty because of the emptiness of feeling.

original: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Feeling itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is feeling.

original: sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Craving is not empty because of the emptiness of craving.

original: sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Craving itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is craving.🔽Clinging is not empty because of the emptiness of clinging.

original: len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin gyi; len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma yin gyi; len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Clinging itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is clinging.

original: srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Existence is not empty because of the emptiness of existence.

original: srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Existence itself is emptiness.🔽Emptiness itself is existence.

original: stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o; ;skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o; ;skye ba'i stong pa nyid kyis skye ba stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Birth is not empty because of the emptiness of birth.

original: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: skye ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Birth itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang skye ba'o //
translated: Emptiness is also birth.

original: rga sha'i stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rga sha'i stong pa nyid kyis rga shi stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of old age and death is not the emptiness of old age and death.

original: rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Old age and death are also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o //
translated: Emptiness is also old age and death.

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang @347a *//
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang @347a *//
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of generosity is not the emptiness of the perfection of generosity.

original: stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of generosity is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the perfection of generosity.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the perfection of morality is not the emptiness of the perfection of morality.🔽The perfection of morality is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the perfection of morality.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the perfection of patience is empty of the emptiness of the perfection of patience.

original: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of patience itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the perfection of patience.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the perfection of effort is empty of the emptiness of the perfection of effort.

original: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of effort itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the perfection of effort.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: It is not that the perfection of concentration is empty of the emptiness of the perfection of concentration.

original: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of concentration itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: Emptiness itself is the perfection of concentration.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The perfection of wisdom is not empty of the emptiness that is the perfection of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The perfection of wisdom itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis @347b nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis @347b nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Emptiness itself is the perfection of wisdom.🔽The emptiness of inner phenomena is not empty of the emptiness of inner phenomena.

original: nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of inner phenomena itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the emptiness of inner phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of outer phenomena is not empty of the emptiness of outer phenomena.

original: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of outer phenomena itself is emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang phyi stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the emptiness of outer phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis phyi nang stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of outer and inner phenomena is not empty of the emptiness of outer and inner phenomena.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the external and the internal is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang phyi nang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of external and internal phenomena is also emptiness.🔽Emptiness is the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is not the emptiness of emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the emptiness of emptiness.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chen po stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the great is not the emptiness of the great.

original: chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chen po stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the great is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chen po stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the emptiness of the great.

original: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the ultimate is not the emptiness of the ultimate.🔽The emptiness of the ultimate is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid do /
translated: Emptiness is the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the conditioned is not empty of the emptiness of the conditioned,

original: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: but the emptiness of the conditioned is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: And emptiness is also the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the unconditioned is not empty of the emptiness of the unconditioned,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: but the emptiness of the unconditioned is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid do //
translated: And emptiness is also the emptiness of the unconditioned.

original: mtha' @348a *// las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mtha' @348a *// las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of what transcends limits is not empty of the emptiness of what transcends limits,

original: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: but the emptiness of what transcends limits is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: And emptiness is also the emptiness of what transcends limits.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of the beginningless and endless is not the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the beginningless and endless is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of non-rejection is not the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of non-rejection is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of non-rejection.

original: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of the nature is not the emptiness of the nature.🔽The emptiness of the nature is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of the nature.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of all phenomena is not the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of all phenomena is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of defining attributes is not the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of defining attributes is also emptiness.🔽Emptiness is also the emptiness of defining attributes.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa @348b nyid do; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa @348b nyid do; ;mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of nonobservation is not the emptiness of nonobservation.🔽The emptiness of nonobservation is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of nonobservation.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of non-things is not the emptiness of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of non-things is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of non-things.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of intrinsic nature is not the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of intrinsic nature is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of intrinsic nature.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid kyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of the nature of non-things is not the emptiness of the nature of non-things.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the emptiness of the nature of non-things is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is also the emptiness of the nature of non-things.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the applications of mindfulness is not the emptiness of the applications of mindfulness.

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The applications of mindfulness themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the applications of mindfulness.

original: yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi; yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag par spong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par spong ba rnams stong pa ma yin gyi; yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the right efforts is not the emptiness of the right efforts.

original: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma @349a *//
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma @349a *//
translated: The right efforts themselves are emptiness.🔽The emptiness of the legs of manifestation is not the emptiness of the legs of manifestation.

original: yin gyi; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: yin gyi; rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The legs of manifestation themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the legs of manifestation.

original: dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyis dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyis dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the faculties is not the emptiness of the faculties.

original: dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The faculties are also empty of the faculties.

original: stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is also the faculties.

original: stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The powers are not empty because of the emptiness of the powers.🔽The powers are also emptiness.

original: stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so //
analyzed: stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is also the powers.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The limbs of awakening are not empty because of the emptiness of the limbs of awakening.🔽The limbs of awakening are also emptiness.

original: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
analyzed: byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is also the limbs of awakening.

original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The noble eightfold path is not empty because of the emptiness of the noble eightfold path.🔽The noble eightfold path is also emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
translated: Emptiness is also the noble eightfold path.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The noble truths are not empty of the emptiness of the noble truths.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The noble truths themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the noble truths.

original: bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan rnams stong pa ma yin gyi / bsam gtan nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The concentrations are not empty of the emptiness of the concentrations.🔽The concentrations themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the concentrations.

original: tshad med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa rnams @349b stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa rnams @349b stong pa ma yin gyi / tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The immeasurables are not empty of the emptiness of the immeasurables.🔽The immeasurables themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the immeasurables.

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The formless [absorptions] are not empty of the emptiness of the formless [absorptions].

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The formless [absorptions] themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: The emptiness of the formless meditative attainments is not the emptiness of the formless meditative attainments.🔽The emptiness of the eight deliverances is not the emptiness of the deliverances.

original: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi / rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The deliverances themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the deliverances.🔽The emptiness of the nine serial steps of meditative absorption is not the emptiness of the serial steps of meditative absorption.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The serial steps of meditative absorption themselves are emptiness.

original: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness itself is the serial steps of meditative absorption.🔽The emptiness of the meditative stabilizations is not the emptiness of the meditative stabilizations.🔽The meditative stabilizations themselves are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness itself is the meditative stabilizations.

original: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of the door of liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness is not the door of liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽The emptiness of the door of liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness is not the door of liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o //🔽mngon par shes pa'i stong pa @350a *//🔽nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o // mngon par shes pa'i stong pa @350a *// nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the door of liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness is not the door of liberation of emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness.🔽The emptiness of the superknowledges is not the superknowledges.

original: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa rnams kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The superknowledges are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the superknowledges.

original: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the meditative stabilizations is not the meditative stabilizations.

original: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The absorptions are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the absorptions.

original: gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo'i stong pa nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are not empty because of the emptiness of the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The dhāraṇī gateways are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the dhāraṇī gateways.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are not empty because of the emptiness of the powers of the tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The powers of the tathāgatas are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so //🔽mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so // mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi / mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: Emptiness is the powers of the tathāgatas.🔽The fearlessnesses are not empty because of the emptiness of the fearlessnesses.🔽The fearlessnesses are emptiness.

original: stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so //
translated: Emptiness is the fearlessnesses.

original: so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the correct understandings is not the correct understandings,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so //
translated: but the correct understandings themselves are emptiness, and emptiness itself is the correct understandings.

original: snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi /🔽snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi / snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of great compassion is not great compassion,

original: stong @350b pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o //
analyzed: stong @350b pa nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o //
translated: but great compassion itself is emptiness, and emptiness itself is great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The emptiness of the distinct attributes of a buddha is not the distinct attributes of a buddha,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do; ;stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so //
translated: but the distinct attributes of a buddha themselves are emptiness, and emptiness itself is the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor / 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti, this is

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: rab 'byor; 'di ni /
analyzed: rab 'byor; 'di ni /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o //
translated: this is the skillful means of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings endowed with that skillful means,

original: bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs me dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro ////
analyzed: bstan pa 'di thos na mi 'jigs me dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ro ////
translated: when they hear this teaching, will not be afraid, terrified, or scared.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa /
translated: Perfection of Wisdom in One Hundred Thousand Lines

original: bam po bzhi bcu gsum pa /
analyzed: bam po bzhi bcu gsum pa /
translated: Fascicle Forty-Three

original: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
analyzed: rab 'byor gyis gsol pa /
translated: Subhūti said,

original: bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das /
translated: “Blessed One,

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na /
translated: when bodhisattva great beings who are supported by a spiritual friend hear this teaching on the perfection of wisdom,

original: mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags /
analyzed: mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags /
translated: they will not be afraid, terrified, or scared. What is that spiritual friend?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa; rab 'byor /
translated: Subhūti,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni /
translated: the spiritual friends of bodhisattva great beings

original: gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston @351a *//🔽cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston @351a *// cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: are those who teach the doctrine to them, using the method of not apprehending anything, that physical forms are impermanent,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: and who do not dedicate all those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except for the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: They are those who teach the doctrine to them, using the method of not apprehending anything, that feelings are impermanent,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: and who do not dedicate all those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, except for the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gang de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
analyzed: gang de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
translated: They are those who teach the doctrine to them, using the method of not apprehending anything, that perceptions are impermanent,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis sa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis sa'am /
translated: the pratyekabuddha level, but to the knowledge of all aspects.🔽“They teach the doctrine that physical forms are impermanent in such a way that there is no attachment to anything,🔽and they do not dedicate all those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: the pratyekabuddha level, but to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: gang de la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stong cing /

translated: “They should teach the doctrine that the perception of a self is the absence of a self.🔽And they should dedicate all those wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, but not to the śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha levels.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //🔽gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa @352b nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /

translated: “They should teach the doctrine that the perception of the selflessness of phenomena is the nonapprehension of all phenomena, and they should teach the doctrine that all wholesome roots are not dedicated to the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas, except for the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //🔽gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /

translated: “They should teach the doctrine that the perception of the selflessness of all formative predispositions is the nonapprehension of all formative predispositions, and they should teach the doctrine that all wholesome roots are not dedicated to the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas, except for the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: “They should teach the doctrine that the perception of the selflessness of consciousness is the nonapprehension of consciousness, and they should teach the doctrine that all wholesome roots are not dedicated to the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas, except for the knowledge of all aspects.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //

original: gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /🔽rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug @353a *//🔽pa'o // gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug @353a *// pa'o // gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: “They should teach the doctrine that the notion of the extinction of consciousness is calm, and they should dedicate all those wholesome roots to the knowledge of all aspects, without dedicating them to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.🔽“They should teach the doctrine that the notion of the extinction of volitional factors is calm, and they should dedicate all those wholesome roots to the knowledge of all aspects, without dedicating them to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.🔽

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: “They should teach the doctrine that the notion of the extinction of form is a non-apprehending character, and they should not dedicate all those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.🔽“They should teach the doctrine that the notion of the extinction of feeling . . .

original: gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
analyzed: gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
translated: the notion of the extinction of perception . . .🔽the notion of the extinction of volitional factors . . .

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: and the notion of the extinction of consciousness is a non-apprehending character, and they should not dedicate all those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.”🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom should not stand in the notion that form is empty, should not stand in the notion that form is not empty, should not stand in the notion that form is with signs, should not stand in the notion that form is signless, should not stand in the notion that form is with wishes, and should not stand in the notion that form is wishless.🔽“They should not stand in the notion that feeling . . .🔽the notion that perception . . .🔽the notion that volitional factors . . .🔽and the notion that consciousness is empty, should not stand in the notion that consciousness is not empty, should not stand in the notion that consciousness is with signs, should not stand in the notion that consciousness is signless, should not stand in the notion that consciousness is with wishes, and should not stand in the notion that consciousness is wishless.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: but not to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: gang de la me'i khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis cos ston cing /🔽dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: gang de la me'i khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis cos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: “They teach the doctrine that the fire element is not a self, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽They dedicate all those wholesome roots to the knowledge of all aspects,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: but not to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level.

original: gang de la rlung gi khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
analyzed: gang de la rlung gi khams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
translated: “They teach the doctrine that the wind element is not a self, and they do so without apprehending anything.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: And they dedicate all their roots of virtue to omniscience, not to the level of the śrāvakas or pratyekabuddhas.

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o //
translated: And he does not dedicate all his wholesome roots to the level of the śrāvakas or the level of the pratyekabuddhas, except for the knowledge of all aspects.
